quote: Empowerment is the ability to refine, improve, and enhance your life without co-dependency.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The purpose of empowerment is to urge you towards freedom, to help each of you to break free of all limitations. It is that freedom that will give you eternal happiness and finally connect you with the unconditional realization of TRUTH.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Enlightenment is the key to empowerment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: An empowered organisation is one in which individuals have the knowledge, skill, desire, and opportunity to personally succeed in a way that leads to collective organisational success.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: A desire to be in charge of our own lives, a need for control, is born in each of us. It is essential to our mental health, and our success, that we take control.
author: Robert Foster Bennett

quote: Meditation, education and beauty are the three transforming powers that can change individual and the whole world.
author: Amit Ray

quote: All it takes for generosity to flow is awareness. By actively pursuing awareness and knowledge, we can make choices that cause less harm and greater good to others in the global community of our shared earth.
author: Zoe Weil,  Most Good, Least Harm: A Simple Principle for a Better World and Meaningful Life

quote: Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: In honor of Oprah Winfrey: Even greater than the ability to inspire others with hope is the power to motivate them to give as much to the lives of others as they would give to their own; and to empower them to confront the worst in themselves in order to discover and claim the best in themselves.
author: Aberjhani,  Journey through the Power of the Rainbow: Quotations from a Life Made Out of Poetry

quote: We cannot prevail by our own might or strength, we need to plug on to the source of our strength so that we will remain resourceful always.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: We can learn the art of fierce compassion - redefining strength, deconstructing isolation and renewing a sense of community, practicing letting go of rigid us-vs.-them thinking - while cultivating power and clarity in response to difficult situations.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: [R]aising children ... was about identifying and amplifying their strengths and virtues, and helping them find the niche where they can live these positive traits to the fullest.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: When freedom prevails, the ingenuity and inventiveness of people creates incredible wealth. This is the source of the natural improvement of the human condition.
author: Brian S. Wesbury

quote: To help humanity, live with kindness and harmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The first step - especially for young people with energy and drive and talent, but not money - the first step to controlling your world is to control your culture. To model and demonstrate the kind of world you demand to live in. To write the books. Make the music. Shoot the films. Paint the art.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: An empowered heart is one filled with self love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The free mind, unafraid of labor, presses on to attain the good.
author: Laura Cereta,  Collected Letters of a Renaissance Feminist

quote: Dissatisfaction can be a source of inspiration if you learn to control it.
author: Tadahiko Nagao

quote: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them
author: Jim Rohn

quote: There is a power that can be created out of pent-up indignation, courage, and the inspiration of a common cause, and that if enough people put their minds and bodies into that cause, they can win. It is a phenomenon recorded again and against in the history of popular movements against injustice all over the world.
author: Howard Zinn,  You Can't Be Neutral on a Moving Train: A Personal History of Our Times

quote: I am powerful in my love for myself. The truth of my being is I love myself exactly as I am. I honor my empowered heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.
author: Les Brown

quote: Dig deep and empower yourself today. Stand in your inner strength. Be uniquely you.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Self-acceptance is pure power.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You trade in your sense for an act. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask. There can't be any large-scale revolution until there's a personal revolution, on an individual level. It's got to happen inside first.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Modesty: the gentle art of enhancing your charm by pretending not to be aware of it.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The educator must believe in the potential power of his pupil, and he must employ all his art in seeking to bring his pupil to experience this power.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
author: Dan Millman

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: To read is to empower,To empower is to write,To write is to influence,To influence is to change,To change is to live".
author: Jane Evershed

quote: Encouragement is like water to the soul, it makes everything grow.
author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: Mental strength induces mind and body.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: The really important kind of freedom involves attention, and awareness, and discipline, and effort, and being able truly to care about other people and to sacrifice for them, over and over, in myriad petty little unsexy ways, every day.
author: David Foster Wallace,  This Is Water: Some Thoughts, Delivered on a Significant Occasion, about Living a Compassionate Life

quote: True generosity is an offering; given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
author: Suze Orman

quote: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It's not that some people have willpower and some don't... It's that some people are ready to change and others are not.
author: James Gordon

quote: This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Resistance is a powerful motivator precisely because it enables us to fulfill our longing to achieve our goals while letting us boldly recognize and name the obstacles to those achievements.
author: Derrick A. Bell

quote: The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Everything that is really great and inspiring is created by the individual who can labor in freedom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The more aware of your intentions and your experiences you become, the more you will be able to connect the two, and the more you will be able to create the experiences of your life consciously. This is the development of mastery. It is the creation of authentic power.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: People inspire you, or they drain you. PICK THEM WISELY.
author: Hans F. Hasen
